about.details:
Incorporated in 1998, Sharika Enterprises is engaged in Engineering Procurement Construction (EPC) contracts, specialized assembling, trading activities, Erection Services, representation services to majorly power Generation, Transmission and Distribution sector.

Sharika Enterprises project portfolio also include installing power transmission EHV cables, designing & installing EMS (Energy Management System) and allied distribution automation Equipments such as Autoreclosers, fault passage indicators (FPI) etc., designing and installing of Solar Power Generation plants.

Sharika Enterprises is based out of Noida and have assembling unit in Jammu and Noida.

Services provided by Sharika Enterprises
1. Engineering Procurement Constructions (EPC)
2. Representative Services
3. Other consultancy Services

contactDetails.full_address: Sharika Enterprises Limited, B-124 Sector-67, Gautam Budh Nagar, Noida 201301

faqs.question: What is the Sharika Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sharika Enterprises IPO is a SME IPO of 3225000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.87 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹43 per share. The minimum order quantity is .

The IPO opens on November 15, 2017, and closes on November 17, 2017.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sharika Enterprises IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sharika Enterprises IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sharika Enterprises IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sharika Enterprises IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sharika Enterprises IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sharika Enterprises IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sharika Enterprises IPO opens on November 15, 2017 and closes on November 17, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sharika Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: Sharika Enterprises IPO lot size and the minimum order quantity is not available at this time. Please check again later.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sharika Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sharika Enterprises IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
